OOC: Just like to say one thing...^^;; This conversation isn't really taking 
such a great turn. We've got G1 fans against BW/BM fans or something going on 
here..all I know is, both series are gettin ragged on. ^^; But BOTH series 
are like a part of the same whole, even if there ARE inconsistencies...and 
they're both a part of this RPG. 

We're all here because we're fans of the series, an' we wanna have a nice RPG 
with 'em...so what's there to argue about, hM? ^_^;; Yeh, I need to shut up 
but..a buncha OOC posts for an argument on the same list that an RPGs takin 
place on grates on my nerves after awhile. ^^;; *cough* Shutting up!

--part1_152.a10c3f5.29b977a1_boundary
